resources.string: Simple Pacer App was created using open source technologies that were under the apache licence 2.0. And all code of the latest builds is posted live at http://github.com/allvens/allworkout

MPAndroidChart was use to present a chart in the log screen in the application of the users pass workouts. The library was not alternated or modified in anyway. Find out more at https://github.com/PhilJay/MPAndroidChart

This End User License Agreement is a legal agreement between you and Allvens, that include action and use of the mobile application Simple Pacer App. Including any revisions, updates, and modifications.
BY USING THE APPLICATION YOU ACCEPT OUR TERMS OF SERVICE AS STATED BELOW AND PRIVACY POLICY. SHOULD YOU NOT ACCEPT OUR TERMS OR PRIVATE POLICY, YOU ARE NOT PERMITTED TO USE THIS APPLICATION
Anyone under the age of 18 is not authorized to use this application without the proper consent of a legal guardian..
Please contact us with any copyright infringement complaints at: allvensinc@gmail.com.
This application is mainly a tool of logging the given pacer session with suggested repetitions. Always make sure to dicuss with a docotor whenever starting a new workout regimen.

This application has also warn users not to push themselves to a point of pain or injury and that we are not liable should they inquire such injuries or pains from following the recommended pacer sesssion info.
Please contact us with any questions at: allvensinc@gmail.com.
